name: Gatchiri @Ignister
desc:
The first time each Cyberse monster you control would be destroyed by card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. You can only use the following effects of "Gatchiri @Ignister" once per turn.
● You can target 1 Cyberse Effect Monster you control; negate its effects, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand.
● If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; that face-up monster you control is unaffected by your opponent's card effects until the end of your opponent's turn.
